content: hat to test stuffing a couple wads of paper towel into the cheeks if desired it looks a little different when worn than when lying flat once you are happy with the placement sew on the eyes with a sharp stout needle and black thread tip punching through multiple layers of packing tape takes a little extra force so use a thimble or something to protect your finger and put some cardboard or a block of wood behind the point mouth take a small piece of contrast yarn and lay out a smile or frown in the size and shape that pleases you now cut a longish piece of contrast yarn and using backstitch stitch along the guide that you laid out weave in the ends and try on your hat stuffing paper towel wads into the top to give it structure if necessary wear your froggy protest hat with pride questions contact aliciamarin on ravelry cheeky frog hat by alicia vause published november 2025 4
